function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of advanced methods in knowledge extraction","Impact":"Inaccurate knowledge extraction leading to misinformation","Mitigation":"Regular validation of extracted knowledge with domain experts","Technologies":"Machine reading comprehension, pretrained language models","People":"Researchers, data scientists","Owner":"Domain experts, research team"},{"Description":"Reliance on distant supervision for labeling process","Impact":"Inaccurate labeling of subject and object triples","Mitigation":"Validation of labeled triples with manual sampling","Technologies":"Machine reading comprehension, distant supervision","People":"Data scientists, researchers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Extraction of incorrect triples from medical literature","Impact":"Propagation of incorrect information in the KG","Mitigation":"Thorough validation and verification of extracted triples","Technologies":"Machine reading comprehension, domain expertise","People":"Data scientists, domain experts","Owner":"Research team"}]}
